name: Stellar Blade x Nier: Automata
summary:
In this DLC, the character “Emil’s Shop” from the action RPG NieR:Automata, produced by Square Enix and directed by Yoko Taro, appears with his item shop in the world of Stellar Blade.

“Emil’s Shop” is a mobile item shop that freely moves around the Wastelands and the Great Desert open areas.
